column72:
SkatePro er en af Danmarks førende e-handelsvirksomheder - vinder af 5 e-handelspriser, kundeservice på 17 sprog, salg i 20+ lande, og en vækst fra 1 => 200+ ansatte på kun fjorten år.

Vi er et ungt og dynamisk team med medarbejdere fra det meste af Europa. Fælles for os alle er, at vi brænder for actionsport, e-commerce og at give kunden den gode oplevelse og den bedste support.

column100:
At SkatePro we are now looking for a new part-time employee with a forklift license for weekend shifts, who can ensure a smooth operation during weekends working in the incoming part of our warehouse. 
 THE POSITION 
 We are a young and dynamic team, and due to busyness we need more colleagues in our incoming-goods part of the warehouse. We are making an effort doing a good job to make the work environment nice for yourself, your colleagues and not least for our customers. 
 The job is a part-time position of approx. 30 hours a month in our Inbound department in the warehouse. The task will include picking and moving goods. Other work tasks will also include maintain order at the warehouse. The work takes place in a warehouse where there will be fluctuating temperatures and the work is physically demanding.  
 Working hours will be fixed every other weekend: 
 
 Saturday: 8:00-16:00 
 Sunday: 11:15-19:00 
 
 In addition, there will be the possibility of extra hours during holiday periods. 
 PERSONAL AND PROFESSIONAL COMPETENCIES 
 
 You have a positive attitude 
 You have a forklift license - required in the job  
 You have a good overview and sense of order 
 You need to be in good physical shape as the work can be demanding 
 You have to be a good team player 
 You speak English, as we have many international colleagues 
 You must be able to present a criminal record  
 Advantage if you have experience with warehouse work 
 
 WE OFFER 
 
 A wide range of work tasks 
 Flexible working conditions and passionate customers 
 Salary based on collective agreement 
 Pension scheme 
 Health insurance 
 
 In addition, we love to have fun with each other both while we are at work and outside working hours. We host a lot of social events during the year, which are sponsored by SkatePro. 
 ABOUT SKATEPRO 
 SkatePro is a Danish action sports e-commerce company based just outside of Aarhus, Denmark, and we sell all kinds of equipment for skate, ski, BMX, surf and much more. Our mission is to ensure everybody who wants to explore the passion within action sport has the means to do so. We give honest advice, so our customer gets exactly what they need instead of, what we think sells best. The customer having a good time with our products is our main focus.   At our office and warehouse in Søften north of Aarhus, our more than 200 employees work together every day to send action sports products to more than 30 countries. 
 PRACTICAL INFORMATION 
 
 Working hours: 30 hours per month 
 Starting date: As soon as possible 
 Application deadline: We invite for interviews on an ongoing basis 
 Workplace: Omega 6, Søften, 8382 Hinnerup 
 
 If you find the position interesting, please send a short application, forklift license documentation and CV (preferably in PDF format) to job@skatepro.com, and write "Forklift licensed weekend employee" in the subject field. Please enter your email address in your CV, so we can get in touch with you quickly.
